org.smartfrog.services.dns
Interface DNSManager

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
DNSManagerImpl
public interface DNSManager
extends java.rmi.Remote

A remote interface to interact with the DNS manager.

Method Summary
 void register(DNSModifier modif)
          Registers a DNS update in the name server.
 boolean sanityCheck()
          Checks that all the bindings that are currently registered can be looked up in the name server.
 void unregister(DNSModifier modif)
          Unregisters a DNS update in the name server.
 

Method Detail

register

void register(DNSModifier modif)
              throws DNSModifierException,
                     java.rmi.RemoteException
Registers a DNS update in the name server.

Parameters:
modif - A DNS update to be added to the name server.
Throws:
DNSModifierException - if an error occurs while registering the update.
java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurs

unregister

void unregister(DNSModifier modif)
                throws DNSModifierException,
                       java.rmi.RemoteException
Unregisters a DNS update in the name server.

Parameters:
modif - A DNS update to be added to the name server.
Throws:
DNSModifierException - if an error occurs while unregistering the update.
java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurs

sanityCheck

boolean sanityCheck()
                    throws DNSModifierException,
                           java.rmi.RemoteException
Checks that all the bindings that are currently registered can be looked up in the name server.

Returns:
True if all the NORMAL bindings are OK, false otherwise.
Throws:
DNSBindingException - If I cannot check that bindings are OK.
java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurs
DNSModifierException
